io.github.trulyfree.modular.display

Interface DisplayableModule<T extends Displayable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of displayable supported by the target display or an extension thereof.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Module

    public interface DisplayableModule<T extends Displayable>
extends Module
    DisplayableModule interface. Implementations of this interface will act as a "parent" for all the Displayables which they monitor, modify, and contain. DisplayableModules which may also appear as subdisplays (i.e. a LinearLayout inside of a LinearLayout in Android) should also implement Displayable.
    Author:
    vtcakavsmoace

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<T> getDisplayables()
      Method to be called in order to retrieve the displayables contained by this module.
      Priority getPriorityThreshold()
      Method to be called in order to get the intended threshold of priority for displayables held within this class.

      Method to be called in order to set the intended threshold of priority for displayables held within this class.

      • Methods inherited from interface io.github.trulyfree.modular.module.Module

        destroy, isReady, setup

    • Method Detail

      • getDisplayables

        Collection<T> getDisplayables()
        Method to be called in order to retrieve the displayables contained by this module. The collection returned should NOT be capable of modifying the module's contained displayables. However, the individual displayables may be modified with changes that do affect those located within this module.
        Returns:
        displayables The displayables held by this module.

      • setPriorityThreshold

        boolean setPriorityThreshold(Priority priority)
        Method to be called in order to set the intended threshold of priority for displayables held within this class. This priority should determine whether or not a displayable will be suppressed should it throw a DisplayableException during rendering. If the priority threshold returned is greater than the priority of the displayable, it will be suppressed, otherwise a DisplayableException will be thrown (uncaught).
        Parameters:
        priority - The new priority threshold of this displayable module.
        Returns:
        success A boolean representing the success or failure of the set operation.

      • getPriorityThreshold

        Priority getPriorityThreshold()
        Method to be called in order to get the intended threshold of priority for displayables held within this class. This priority should determine whether or not a displayable will be suppressed should it throw a DisplayableException during rendering. If the priority threshold returned is greater than the priority of the displayable, it will be suppressed, otherwise a DisplayableException will be thrown (uncaught).
        Returns:
        threshold The priority threshold of this displayable module.
